results.title: Next not found in deploying teh >Next project on the Azure App Service - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Option 1: Allow NextAuth.js to manage authentication 1). Disable Azure Authentication (Easy Auth): Go to your App Service → Authentication Turn off 2). Set environment variables in Azure App Service -> Configuration NextAuth.js Deployment 4). Redeploy and Restart the App Option 2 : Keep Azure Authentication enabled If you need Azure Easy Auth.

descriptions.content: Option 1: Allow NextAuth.js to manage authentication 1). Disable Azure Authentication (Easy Auth): Go to your App Service → Authentication Turn off 2). Set environment variables in Azure App Service -> Configuration NextAuth.js Deployment 4). Redeploy and Restart the App Option 2 : Keep Azure Authentication enabled If you need Azure Easy Auth.

results.title: Fetching user data from access token received from NextAuth. - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: I am trying to use NextAuth for next.js with Azure Active directory for single-sign-on. I followed the guide on Microsoft's identity platform quickstart guide: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entr... What I am trying to accomplish: Get an authorization token (access or id token) from the frontend (Nextauth) and then the backend uses the token to.

results.title: Azure Ad B2C: from client to server to another server? - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Next.js has a nice library called nextAuth which allows using Azure Ad B2C as provider, see here: nextAuth Docs I have been struggling for a few days to implement authorization as everything is still a bit new to me, so I have a lot of trouble distinguishing what I need and what are details for later. Next.js has a nice library called nextAuth.

descriptions.content: Next.js has a nice library called nextAuth which allows using Azure Ad B2C as provider, see here: nextAuth Docs I have been struggling for a few days to implement authorization as everything is still a bit new to me, so I have a lot of trouble distinguishing what I need and what are details for later. Next.js has a nice library called nextAuth.
